languages.text: "Помни ошибки Иеронимуса, Капеллан. И не повтори их".
"Remember Hieronymus's mistakes, Chaplain. And do not repeat them."
languages.original_text: "Помни ошибки Иеронимуса, Капеллан. И не повтори их".

traits.locale_text: "Remember Hieronymus's mistakes, Chaplain. And do not repeat them."
"Remember Hieronymus's mistakes, Chaplain. And do not repeat them."

languages.text: “要记住希罗尼穆斯牧师犯下的错误，牧师。不要重蹈覆辙。”
languages.original_text: "Remember Hieronymus's mistakes, Chaplain. And do not repeat them."

traits.locale_text: “要记住希罗尼穆斯牧师犯下的错误，牧师。不要重蹈覆辙。”

languages.text: 「ヒエロニムスの失敗を忘れるな、教戒官。そして同じ過ちを繰り返さないように」
languages.original_text: "Remember Hieronymus's mistakes, Chaplain. And do not repeat them."

traits.locale_text: 「ヒエロニムスの失敗を忘れるな、教戒官。そして同じ過ちを繰り返さないように」

languages.text: «Recuerde los errores de Hieronymus, capellán, y no los repita».
languages.original_text: "Remember Hieronymus's mistakes, Chaplain. And do not repeat them."

traits.locale_text: «Recuerde los errores de Hieronymus, capellán, y no los repita».

languages.text: "Denkt an Hieronymus' Fehler, Ordenspriester. Und wiederholt sie nicht."
languages.original_text: "Remember Hieronymus's mistakes, Chaplain. And do not repeat them."

traits.locale_text: "Denkt an Hieronymus' Fehler, Ordenspriester. Und wiederholt sie nicht."

languages.text: « Souvenez-vous des erreurs de Hiéronymus, Chapelain, et surtout, ne les répétez pas. »
languages.original_text: "Remember Hieronymus's mistakes, Chaplain. And do not repeat them."

traits.locale_text: « Souvenez-vous des erreurs d'Hiéronymus, Chapelain, et surtout, ne les répétez pas. »

languages.text: "Hieronymus'un hatalarını aklından çıkarma Papaz. Onları tekrarlama."
languages.original_text: "Remember Hieronymus's mistakes, Chaplain. And do not repeat them."

traits.locale_text: "Hieronymus'un hatalarını aklından çıkarma Papaz. Ve de onları tekrarlama."
